channel.title: Projects on Braam Beresford
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Braam Beresford

item.title: Junior Design
item.description: For our Junior design project we created created a system that is able to harvest power from a 170 Watt solar panel and safely deliver it to various charging circuits. The system does power point tracking in order to achieve proper input current and voltages. Once the Printed Circuit Board (PCB) takes in the solar power it safely charges: Sealed Lead Acid (SLA) battery with proper charging curve An 18650 Lithium Ion cell USB-C Power Delivery compatible phones and batteries The USB-C Power Delivery (PD) protocol allows the charger to negotiate a charging rate to deliver up to 45 Watts of power.
